channel.title: Food, Coffee, Code
channel.description: Recent content on Food, Coffee, Code

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Calen Robinette and I am currently a graduate student studying computer science in Georgia Tech’s OMSCS program. Prior to this, I attended Portland State University studying mathematics with a focus on Topology. You can contact me via email and can find my updated resume here. Besides computers and math, I’ve spent a good portion of my life dedicated to studying coffee and food. I have competed as a barista, helped organize coffee community events, and generally enjoy learning and talking about coffee.
